channel.title: Client Button
channel.description:
Hey Moparscape,
Well I'm trying to add a button like the one to the side of the little red square I put on the picture. How do i find out the exact spot in numbers to put it?
http://img593.imageshack.us/img593/3131/optiontab.png

item.title: Client Button
item.dc:creator: @New_Legacy New Legacy
item.description:
@New_Legacy wrote:

Added that number but it still doesn’t appear in the spot. I’m using a PI Client.

Read full topic

item.title: Client Button
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:


Sprites: http://www.mediafire.com/?4wxy1eaa9mxp44m

[code] public static void optionTab(TextDrawingArea[] TDA){
RSInterface Interface = addTabInterface(904);
addText(6282, “Options”, 0xFF9933, false, true, 52,TDA, 1);
addHover(19069, 5, 0, 19070, 1, “OEMN/TAB”, 40, 40, “Graphics Settings”);
addHovered(19070, 15, “OEMN/TAB”, 152, 30, 19071);
addHover(19072, 5, 0, 19073, 2, “OEMN/TAB”, 40, 40, “Audio Settings”);
addHovered(19073, 16, “OEMN/TAB”, 152, 30, 19074);
addSHover(19075, 5, 0, 19076, 3, 4, “OEMN/TAB”, 40, 40, “Toggle Number of Mouse Buttons”, 170, 1);
addHovered(19076, 17, “OEMN/TAB”, 89, 17, 19077);
addSHover(19078, 5, 0, 19079, 5, 6, “OEMN/TAB”, 40, 40, “Toggle Chat Effects”, 171, 1);
addHovered(19079, 18, “OEMN/TAB”, 89, 17, 19080);
addSHover(19081, 5, 0, 19082, 7, 8, “OEMN/TAB”, 40, 40, “Toggle-Split Private Chat”, 287, 1);
addHovered(19082, 19, “OEMN/TAB”, 101, 17, 19083);
addSHover(19084, 5, 0, 19085, 9, 10, “OEMN/TAB”, 40, 40, “Toggle Accept Aid”, 427, 1);
addHovered(19085, 20, “OEMN/TAB”, 200, 200, 19086);
addSHover(153, 5, 0, 19088, 11, 12, “OEMN/TAB”, 40, 40, “Toggle Run Mode”, 173, 1);
addHovered(19088, 21, “OEMN/TAB”, 200, 200, 19089);
addHover(19090, 5, 0, 19091, 23, “OEMN/TAB”, 40, 40, “Toggle Summoning”);
addHovered(19091, 22, “OEMN/TAB”, 152, 30, 19092);
addSprite(19094, 0, “OEMN/TAB”);
setChildren(20, Interface);
setBounds(19094, 0, 25, 0, Interface);
setBounds(19094, 0, 110, 1, Interface);
setBounds(6282, 68, 4, 0+2, Interface);
setBounds(19069, 45, 45, 1+2,Interface);
setBounds(19072, 100, 45, 2+2,Interface);
setBounds(19075, 20, 135, 3+2,Interface);
setBounds(19078, 75, 135, 4+2,Interface);
setBounds(19081, 130, 135, 5+2,Interface);
setBounds(19084, 20, 190, 6+2,Interface);
setBounds(153, 75, 190, 7+2,Interface);
setBounds(19090, 130, 190, 8+2,Interface);
setBounds(19070, 25, 95, 9+2,Interface); //Hover
setBounds(19073, 25, 95, 10+2,Interface); //Hover
setBounds(19076, 25, 185, 11+2,Interface); //Hover
setBounds(19079, 80, 185, 12+2,Interface); //Hover
setBounds(19082, 85, 185, 13+2,Interface); //Hover
setBounds(19085, 25, 170, 14+2,Interface); //Hover
setBounds(19088, 80, 170, 15+2,Interface); //Hover
setBounds(19091, 80, 170, 16+2,Interface); //Hover
setBounds(149, 82, 210, 19, Interface);

	Interface = interfaceCache[149];
	Interface.anInt219 =  0xFF9933;
	Interface.textDrawingAreas = TDA[3];
	Interface.textShadow = true;
	Interface.centerText = true;
}	[/code]
